Handler
public final class RemoteEnvelopeToByteBufCodec extends MessageToMessageCodec<io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf,RemoteEnvelope<? extends com.google.protobuf.MessageLite>,InetSocketAddressWrapper>
This codec converts RemoteEnvelope to ByteBuf an vice vera.

    • decode

      protected void decode(HandlerContext ctx, InetSocketAddressWrapper sender, io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf msg, List<Object> out) throws Exception
      Description copied from class: MessageToMessageCodec
      Decode from one message to one or more other. This method will be called for each inbound message that can be handled by this decoder.
      Specified by:
      decode in class MessageToMessageCodec<io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf,RemoteEnvelope<? extends com.google.protobuf.MessageLite>,InetSocketAddressWrapper>
      Parameters:
      ctx - the HandlerContext which this MessageToMessageDecoder belongs to
      sender - the sender of the message
      msg - the message to decode
      out - the List to which decoded messages should be added
      Throws:
      Exception - is thrown if an error occurs

    • encode

      Description copied from class: MessageToMessageCodec
